entry.title: Jamming mitigation call for 2023
entry.summary: Hello everyone, Clara has announced that the next call for discussing anti-jamming will take place on January 23rd at 6 pm UTC. The meeting will be held at the usual place and participants can join through the link provided: https://meet.jit.si/UnjammingLN. A draft of the agenda is already available for review on GitHub at https://github.com/ClaraShk/LNJamming/issues/1. Participants are encouraged to add additional agenda items for discussion on the same issue. That's all for now, see you all soon on the call!
